<L>3650<pc>256-2<k1>द्रौणि<k2>द्रौणि
{@Drauṇi@}¦ (do.) = Aśvatthāman: I, †196, †200, 302, 562, 563,
567, 569, 575, 577; II, 1287, 1530, 2014; III, 8283, 15084;
IV, 1150, 1302, 1488, 1550 (C. by error {%Dro°%}), 1583, 1596,
1624, 1643, 1733, 1899, 1901, 1906, 1909, †2117, †2131,
2203; V, 2159, 2185, 2189, 2192, 2201, 2206 (C. by error
{%Dro°%}), 2281, 2375, 2502, 2966, 4796, 7563, 7576, 7585
(promised to slay the army of Yudhiṣṭhira in ten days);
VI, 1714, 2145, 2160, 2361, 2362, 2363, 2365, 2497, 2680,
2687, 2690, 2910, 2928, 3199, 3205, 3206, 3212, 3330, 3555,
3602, 3607, 3608, 3610, 3613, 3838, 3857, 3858, 4133, 4210
(attacked by Nīla), 4211, 4214, 4218 (attacked by Ghaṭotkaca),
4221, 4223, 4244, 4458 (all. to Goharaṇaparvan), 4545,
4626, 4627, 4629, 4633, 4635, 4636, 5164, 5167, 5364,
5384; VII, 633, 1093, 1366, 1368, 1377, 1410, 1589, 1609,
1650, 1838, 1864, 1873, 1875, 1876 (read {%Drauṇiṃ%} with
B.), 1896, 2575, 2629, 2673, 3023, 3539, 3865, 3894, 3913,
3918, 3922, 3923, 3937, 4310, 5629, 5809, 5810, 5812,
5813, 5818, 6075, 6077, 6107, 6108, 6124, 6205, 6247,
